elements methodparam methodparam Element
methodparam &methodparam.purpose;
&methodparam.synopsis.gen; Description
In the syntax summary of a ConstructorSynopsis, DestructorSynopsis, or MethodSynopsis, MethodParam provides the description of a parameter to the method. Typically, this includes the data type of the parameter and its name, but may also include an initial value and other modifiers.
Processing expectations
&format.inline; For a complete description of the processing expectations, see ClassSynopsis.
&methodparam.parents.gen; &methodparam.children.gen;
Attributes
choice
Choice indicates whether the MethodParam is required (Req or Plain) or optional (Opt). Arguments identified as Plain are required, but are shown without additional decoration.
rep
A Rep value of Repeat indicates that the MethodParam is reapeatable.
